name: ScriptCam
title: ScriptCam - use your webcam in jquery
description: ScriptCam is a popular JQuery plugin to manipulate webcams. Take snapshots, detect movement and colors, record videoclips, generate animated GIFs, make thumbnails and organize one-to-one and one-to-many videochats using JavaScript on your own site. Impress your clients and visitors with this multi-language and fully customizable library.
